description.value:
Requirements You are holding or wearing a hacking toolkit and have a free hand.

Whether it's a sudden comm unit ping or a warning alarm on an equipment display, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Create a Diversion] by using Computers instead of Deception on an adjacent target carrying, wearing, or wielding a tech item.

[[/act create-a-diversion variant=distracting-words skill=computers]]

[[/act create-a-diversion variant=gesture skill=computers]]

[[/act create-a-diversion variant=trick skill=computers]]
